title: Unfair punishments to toxic players.
body:
I understand toxicity is a big problem and needs to be stopped but here me out.
I am without a doubt the most toxic player on oceania and if you dont believe me just ask riot. ive had 68 seperate 40 game chat bans on this account in the past year and a half. but that is not the point, the point here is that i think the punishment system placed ingame by riot is unfair towards toxic players, i'm a very good player currently p5 and i could be higher if i was nice to other players but im not. I dont know why but i have always been a mean person. all through school i was verbally abusive towards people and its part of my attitude. I find however that players who go 0-16 and are clearly trolling get no punishment and yet when i rage i get chat restrictions and bans. sure i shouldnt rage because its not helping the situation but i personally believe 0-16 is worse than me saying "ur fken bad". i just think the overall system is flawed and needs looking at. also the fact that 12vies come onto an online game expecting not to get flamed? like really?

replies.body: just honestly surprised that you got your end of season rewards

Just because someone else breaks the rules doesn't mean you can break the rules. Report and move on, by raging at them you're giving them the response they want, which is attention, if you just ignore them and report them Riot will hand out punishments where due (and not to you). If you willingly break the rules don't complain about the consequences.
